title: Procurement of DRs over such land, by way of registered document by the Promoter, provided that the
clause_text: Procurement of DRs over such land, by way of registered document by the Promoter, provided that the area over which the Promoter holds DRs shall be regarded as one plot for all the purposes of the DCPR; or

source_pdf.text_snippet: Procurement of DRs over such land, by way of registered document by the Promoter, provided that the area over which the Promoter holds DRs shall be regarded as one plot for all the purposes of the DCP
